The Author Information section provides specific article requirements to help you turn your research into an article suitable for BMJ Open. Information is also provided on [editorial policies](https://bmjopen.bmj.com/pages/authors/#editorial_policy) and [open access](https://bmjopen.bmj.com/pages/authors/#article_publishing_charges).
